attributes.action: GET RID OF THE ROBBING COUNCIL TAX
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the Queens public are fed-up paying such high Council Tax bills for nothing. Why should we continue to pay for mp's etc sitting on their bums doing nothing. Also most of it pays for the immergration of people the UK does not need. Give the UK back to us. Why should we pay to live in houses we are already paying tax on with all your other invisable taxes.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/End-Council-Tax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
